member.name: M:Bilerp.Bilerp.InverseBilerp(Stride.Core.Mathematics.Vector2,Stride.Core.Mathematics.Vector2,Stride.Core.Mathematics.Vector2,Stride.Core.Mathematics.Vector2,Stride.Core.Mathematics.Vector2)
member.summary: Inverse bilinear interpolation: given four points defining a quadrilateral, compute the uv coordinates of any point in the plane that would give result to that point as a bilinear interpolation of the four points. The problem can be solved through a quadratic equation. More information in this article
